name: Kittyverse of Madness
description:
On Kittyverse of Madness you play as a grumpy cat, fighting off hordes of cursed creatures in a land of magic, explosions and of course… KITTENS! Try to survive long enough to find yourself face to face with your greatest enemy, the great Dr. Walter Spray.

Build you way to victory

Choose several combinations of perks and try to find the perfect one for you! You might want to give birth to a kitten that will aid you in battle or perhaps you want to get explosive diarrhea to obliterate your enemies. It 's all up to you!

The Forge

A wooden trunk, a dwarf beard and a muscular chinchilla, what do those things have in common? Well, in the wrong hands, nothing, but you’re an experienced blacksmith that can use anything you want to forge the ultimate weapon!

The Incubator

You’re not only a great fighter and a blacksmith, but you are also a great parent, capable of taking care of all types of creatures. Find eggs in the wild, hatch them in the incubator and obtain loyal allies.

Features

  • Auto and manual options for firing and aiming
  • Runs that can be done in under 20 minutes
  • Unique builds every run
  • Pets with leveling system
  • Weapon crafting using all kinds of materials: chinchillas, ingots, fishes
  • Three types of weapons: Bow, Staff and Boomerang
  • Unique and funny perks
  • Egg incubator system
  • Bosses
  • Permanent upgrades

Thanks for reaching this far! I'm a solo indie developer and I really appreciate your interest in my game! Defeat creatures, try different builds, have fun. Oh, and don’t forget to share it with your friends! Anyway, thank you again and I hope you have a great day!

See you in the Kittyverse!
